thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Alison, Dublin
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Alison, Dublin

author: Alison, Dublin
title: Alison, Dublin
text:
As a first time customer of McElhinneys online - I am extremely impressed.
I found a perfect pair of shoes online, in the sale, images and product information was very excellent.
I ordered on Friday lunchtime, shoes were delivered Tuesday lunchtime, perfectly wrapped, with a lovely personal note from the person who had prepared the delivery.
The returns policy is very clear. All email correspondences are clear and simple. Congratulations on a very well run operation.
